channel.title: CVE Feed for Cloudflare -- goflow
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Cloudflare -- goflow

item.title: CVE-2022-2529|2024-08-03T00:39:08.043Z -- cloudflare -- goflow
item.description: sflow decode package does not employ sufficient packet sanitisation which can lead to a denial of service attack. Attackers can craft malformed packets causing the process to consume large amounts of memory resulting in a denial of service.
